price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߦߴߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ߟߊߡߊ߬ ߖߐ߫ ߊߟߎ߯ ߡߍ߲ ߜߎ߲߬ߘߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߟߊ߲ߞߣߍߡߊ߫ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tusirrūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
